condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II.A.1 | Description :The PMO shall monitor and evaluate the progress of theProject and prepare Project Reports and on the basis of indicators agreed with the Bank and set forth in the Operational Manual.Each Project Report shall cover the period of one calendar semester, and shallbe furnished to the Bank not later than 45 days afterthe end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II.B.3 | Description :The PMO and PIA shall have its financial statementsaudited every year and furnish the Bank a report no later than six months afterthe end of such period. The audited FinancialStatements shall be publicly available in a timely fashion and in a manner acceptableto the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section I.A.4 | Description :The PMO shall furnish to the Bank for approval, aninitial work and budget plan covering the first eighteen months of Project implementation; and an annual implementation plan byDecember 15 each year, beginning on December 15, 2014. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section II.A.3 | Description :The PMO and PIA shall prepare and furnish to the Bankan annual operation and maintenance plan to ensure that resources are allocated, and capacity is available, to adequately maintainand operate all assets built, refurbished and/or acquired as part of the implementation of the Project. These plans will be updatedevery year. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: IO-3: Km of newly constructed drainage pipelines
IO-4: Km of newly constructed sewage pipelines
IO-1:Length of embankments and slopes strengthened as part of project investments
IO-8: Number of staff from PMO and related bureaus (including decision makers) who attend trainings and study tours (both domesticand international)
PO-2: Urban area serviced by exclusive and improved drainage system.
IO-5: People (male/female) benefitting from “improved drainage facilities” under the Project (disaggregated by Gender)
IO-2: Total area subject to inundation by 1-in-50-year river floods
PO-1: Percentage of population within existing urban area vulnerable to 1-in 50-year river floods
IO-7: Completion status of the flood hazard and risk maps for the city

actual.value: Flood mapping is under preparation and is expected to be completed by December 2018

title.narrative: Direct beneficiary of the project, with percentage of women
